title: dredg
content:
Anyone else heard of this band? I saw them live last night, and not only did they completely rock, but I met them afterwards and they were really cool guys.

They have sort of a progressive art rock sound that's really too hard to describe, you have to listen to their stuff. I recommend anyone to get their two most recent albums, El Cielo and Catch Without Arms. You can here a few of their songs on their website - [url=http://www.dredg.com/]www.dredg.com/[/url][url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: dredg
content:
I hered the songs (sorry) and I like them. But the leadsinger could have been a little bit better he sounds very bored to me.-----------------

title: Re: dredg
content:
This is what progressive rock has come to?! They're no [url=http://coheedandcambria.com]Coheed[/url] (although they're playing shows with them in September and October).________________
